Posts.Content: dear so sorry to read your symptoms, I also experienced the same situation few years ago burning intense pain.side.of the breast. flaky itchy and watery blood came out of nipple. went for ultra sound it was clear, radiologist suggested me primrose evening oil, trust me just taking 2 doses all my symptoms disappeared. later on I was diagnosed with costochondritis and fibromyalgia Report Reply
Posts.Title: Worried about inflammatory breast cancer
